.class public auto ansi sealed WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs)
public delegate void WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs ^ e);
type WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventHandler = delegate of obj * WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs -> unit

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de un .

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este evento se produce cuando el necesita la de un trabajo de impresión.This event occurs when the needs the of a print job. Cuando se crea un delegado de , se identifica el método que controla el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controlador de eventos, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
